title: Individual liberties and equality before the law index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem). It captures the extent to which laws are transparent and predictably enforced, public administration is impartial, and citizens enjoy access to justice, secure property rights, freedom from forced labor, freedom of movement, physical integrity rights, and freedom of religion. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most liberties).

relatedQuestions.text: How do different approaches score democracy across the world?
